Border-Control.setting.borderControlEnab: Generate token bases based on token disposition or actor folder color.
Border-Control.setting.removeBorders.hin: Remove the border from specific tokens
Border-Control.setting.permanentBorder.h: Permanently shows token borders unless directly hidden, selected tokens have double width borders
Border-Control.setting.borderWidth.name: Override Default Border Width
Border-Control.setting.borderWidth.hint: The default value for the border width.
Border-Control.setting.borderGridScale.h: Scale border width to grid size, based on 100px grid
Border-Control.setting.borderOffset.name: Border Offset
Border-Control.setting.circleBorders.hin: Draw borders as a circle instead of following the grid's shape
Border-Control.setting.scaleBorder.name: Scale Borders
Border-Control.setting.scaleBorder.hint: Scales token border according to the 'scale' token setting
Border-Control.setting.hudEnable.name: Border HUD element
Border-Control.setting.hudEnable.hint: Add Token HUD element to disable/enable borders
Border-Control.setting.hudColumn.name: HUD Column
Border-Control.setting.hudColumn.hint: Which HUD column to place the button in
Border-Control.setting.hudTopBottom.name: HUD Top/Bottom
Border-Control.setting.hudTopBottom.hint: Where to place the button in the column
Border-Control.setting.hostileColor.name: Color: Hostile
Border-Control.setting.neutralColor.name: Color: Neutral
Border-Control.setting.partyColor.name: Color: Party
Border-Control.setting.partyColorEx.name: Color: Party External
Border-Control.setting.secretColor.name: Color: Secret
Border-Control.setting.color-from.name: Generate Token Faction Color From
Border-Control.setting.color-from.opt.cu: A Custom Color Set For Token Disposition
Border-Control.setting.zoomScaling.name: Zoom Scaling
Border-Control.setting.zoomScaling.hint: Scales the border width to the zoom scaling.
Border-Control.setting.healthGradient.hi: [NOT RECOMMENDED] It's advisable to let this check UNCHECKED . Use instead other modules like 'Arbron s Improved HP Bar' and 'FoundryVTT Bar Brawl' for customize the token hp.
Border-Control.setting.stepLevel.name: Gradient Step Level
Border-Control.setting.stepLevel.hint: [NEED 'Enable HP Gradient' ENABLED] How many individual colors are part of the gradient
Border-Control.setting.disableNameplateD: FEATURE: Disable the nameplate design feature
[NOT RECOMMENDED] It's advisable to let this check CHECKED . Use instead other modules like 'Token Variant Art', 'Custom Nameplates' for apply design to nameplate
Border-Control.setting.circularNameplate: [NEED 'Disable the nameplate design feature' DISABLED] Requires a refresh
[NEED 'Disable the nameplate design feature' DISABLED] Requires a refresh
Nameplate Color for GM only view
[NEED 'Disable the nameplate design feature' DISABLED] Nameplate color used when only the GM can see the nameplate
Border-Control.setting.nameplateOffset.h: [NEED 'Disable the nameplate design feature' DISABLED] Requires a refresh
Border-Control.setting.plateFont.name: Nameplate Font
Border-Control.setting.plateFont.hint: [NEED 'Disable the nameplate design feature' DISABLED] Requires a refresh
Border-Control.setting.sizeMultiplier.hi: [NEED 'Disable the nameplate design feature' DISABLED] Requires a refresh
[NEED 'Disable the nameplate design feature' DISABLED] Attempts to keep nameplates the same size across different grid sizes
Border-Control.setting.disableDrawBarsDe: FEATURE: Disable the draw bars design feature
[NOT RECOMMENDED] It's advisable to let this check CHECKED . Use instead other modules like 'Arbron s Improved HP Bar' and 'FoundryVTT Bar Brawl' for customize the token bars.
Border-Control.setting.barAlpha.name: Transparent Bars
Border-Control.setting.barAlpha.hint: [NEED 'Disable the draw bars design feature' DISABLED] Display transparent HUD bars if these elements are not visible to players
Border-Control.setting.disableRefreshTar: [NOT RECOMMENDED] It's advisable to let this check CHECKED . Use instead other modules like 'Easy Target' and 'Smart Target' for apply design to target
Border-Control.setting.targetColor.name: Color: Target
Border-Control.setting.targetSize.name: Target Size Multiplier
Border-Control.setting.internatTarget.hi: [NEED 'Disable the target feature' DISABLED] Target reticule inside  token borders
Border-Control.setting.reset.name: Reset settings to default
Border-Control.setting.reset.label: Reset Settings To Default
Border-Control.setting.reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.
Border-Control.setting.debug.name: Enable debugging
Border-Control.setting.debug.label: Prints debug messages to the console
Border-Control.dialogs.resetsettings.con: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!
Border-Control.dialogs.nosystemfound.con:
This system is not currently fully supported. This means that the module does not know how to best handle this system's items, but can still operate in a limited fashion.

You can configure the module's settings yourself, but it requires a bit of technical know-how.

If you have any questions, ping Wasp#2005 on the Foundry discord.
Border-Control.dialogs.systemfound.title: System Recognized
Border-Control.dialogs.systemfound.conte:
This system was previously not supported, but in an recent update it was added as a supported system!

Do you want to load this system's default Item Pile settings?
